snippet: The popular digital music service has only been able to reach a deal with EMI -- the others are suing for copyright infringement. But now EMI is suing, too, accusing Grooveshark's parent company of breach of contract.
abstract: The popular digital music service has only been able to reach a deal with EMI -- the others are suing for copyright infringement. But now EMI is suing, too, accusing Grooveshark's parent company of breach of contract.

headline.main: New Lawsuit Means All Major Labels Are Suing Grooveshark
